subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
Ankles (Body Part)
lead_paragraph: Mark Teixeira was 20 when he sustained an ankle injury similar to Derek Jeter’s. Teixeira said Jeter’s age might help him: he doesn’t have to worry about his career, only his final season.
snippet: Mark Teixeira was 20 when he sustained an ankle injury similar to Derek Jeter’s. Teixeira said Jeter’s age might help him: he doesn’t have to worry about his career, only his final season.
